main event: A UFO report from Project Blue Book dated 7th July 1952 from Springfield, Ohio, mentioning a sighting and a detailed questionnaire for the observer to provide information about the unidentified aerial phenomenon.
interesting points: The report includes a detailed questionnaire with specific questions about the sighting, such as the time of day, the location, the appearance of the object, and the observer's personal details.
The form includes questions about the behavior and characteristics of the object, such as its brightness, movement, shape, and sound.
The observer is asked to draw a picture showing the shape and motion of the object, as well as estimate its size and distance from the observer.
The questionnaire also collects data about the weather and the presence of other witnesses during the sighting.
The observer, identified as a Superintendent Engineer aged 27, provided his personal details and indicated his vocational training and profession.
photographs: no photographs included in the report
